Project01: Environments/Color Play

February 1, 2017

Team

Taeyeon Kim / Estee Bruno

Design Qustion

How can people rely on a box to keep the visual appeal of color alive?

World We Set

This is a fictional world where everything is black and white. There is no color. The only way to see color is by going to a special small box on every corner and looking through it to see color. The visual appeal of color will only last a few seconds. A moment of appreciating color is all someone needs. In order to see color again, you need to go back to the box.

Audience

People who lost colors in their life.

Rough Sketch of Project(Schematic)

Prototype 1
